title: New: Pearla – Somewhere
body:
Elements of Maggie Rogers and Sylvan Esso to this latest track from NY’s **Pearla** (Nicole Rodriguez).

There’s some killer songwriting at the core of this, that manages to feel deeply intimate whilst maintaining enough of a pop edge to stay relatively accessible. Almost like an ode to self-doubt, _Somewhere_ perfectly captures the feeling of being lost within oneself, and forever searching for more. Check it out below.
